name: Box logistics
description:
This game has a super simple goal - just put all boxes to their places. But you can move only one box so every level is a difficult puzzle to solve with only one possible solution. "Box logistics" is a great choice for all puzzle lovers. Try to beat all levels!

Game Features:
[ul]
  • Nice pixel arts
  • Classic game mechanics
  • Slow and relaxing puzzle gameplay
  • 40 challenging levels[/ul]
